parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Controls Table

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Takes array of row indices as a parameter and removes rows with those indices. Indices of remaining rows will be recomputed.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> ctrl '''ctRemoveRows''' indices

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> indices: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctRemoveRows]] [0, 1, 2];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctAddRow]], [[ctAddHeader]], [[ctClear]], [[ctCurSel]], [[ctSetCurSel]], [[ctRowControls]], [[ctHeaderControls]], [[ctRowCount]], [[ctHeaderCount]], [[ctSetValue]], [[ctValue]], [[ctSetData]], [[ctData]], [[ctFindRowHeader]], [[ctFindHeaderRows]], [[ctRemoveHeaders]], [[ctSetRowTemplate]], [[ctSetHeaderTemplate]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on January 2, 2021 - 15:05 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:7erra|7erra]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If you want to remove a row by clicking on a button in the ControlsTable make sure that the code is scheduled. Otherwise the game will crash.
</dd>
</dl>
